Duties of ALL Apostles . . .
 
1. Preach salvation, deliverance and healing . . . Mark 6:7-13 (Mark 3:14-15; Luke 9:1-5)
2. Forgiving sins . . . John 20:23
3. Care and feed the flock . . . John 21:15-17
4. Preach and testify . . . Acts 10:42 (Acts 1 and 2)
5. The keys of heaven . . . Matthew 16:19
6. Witnesses . . . Luke 24:48; 2 Peter 1:16-18; 1 John 1:1-4 (John 15:27; Acts 1:8, 2:32, 3:15, 4:33, 5:32, 10:39-41; 13:31)
7. Teach true faith . . . 1 Timothy 2:7
8. Write of the Lord . . . 2 Peter 3:14-16
9. Follow up on believers – pray for Holy Spirit baptism . . . Acts 8:14-17

lenders.loan_because: We like the idea that our money goes straight to the places where it can make a difference, and we like to read the stories of those who have benefited from loans.
lenders.occupational_info:
Liz works in training - teaching business people from many different backgrounds how to be more creative and innovative in their work (and to enjoy it more too!). 
Anthony works in scientific measurement and metrology, researching and creating new machines and technologies that will allow the world to measure lengths more accurately.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: I should
lenders.occupational_info: Crap

lenders.name: Ståle
lenders.loan_because: It is nice to lend some money to someone who really need it.

lenders.name: Travis
lenders.loan_because: Because I can
lenders.occupational_info: Creating maps using computers

lenders.name: wendy
lenders.loan_because: It's humbling to know that a relatively small donation or assistance of any kind can change a persons life, starting with providing HOPE.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Tricia
lenders.loan_because: I went to Togo many years ago when I visited my brother who was in the Peace Corps at the time. I am so impressed by women in developing countries who are able to overcome every day obstacles and pursue their dreams.

lenders.name: Sage
lenders.loan_because: Helping people in need when you have the means is simply the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Technology Sales

lenders.name: Rana Davis
lenders.loan_because: We feel that the direct impact made through KIVA loans is the best way to pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I have such great respect for the men and women who have volunteered to serve our country in the military. Their sacrifices have inspired me to volunteer to serve them.

lenders.name: Michele
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping other women in my community and around the world.

lenders.name: Raymond
lenders.loan_because: $50 dollars just means a nice dinner to me, but can translate into a substantial capital investment into a sustainable business.  I loan because investing in people needs to start somewhere. I want to embody the change I want to see in the world.

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the interdependent web of life.

lenders.name: Jacqueline
lenders.loan_because: Compassion positively affects all dimensions of a person
lenders.occupational_info: Nurse

lenders.name: Will
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I study environmental engineering, and hope to go into water resources.  Everybody needs water. In the meantime I bake donuts at the local coffee shop.

lenders.name: Yen Choon
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: John & Diann
lenders.loan_because: We believe in people.
lenders.occupational_info: we invest in the potential of the human spirit. every person has dreams and ambitiions no matter where they live. we're proud to be able to invest in those individuals.

lenders.name: taylor
lenders.loan_because: i want to decrease world suck

lenders.name: susan
lenders.loan_because: I would like to make a difference in the lives of people who work hard and want to be successful and take care of their families.

lenders.name: Tamara
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of people across the globe.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children to speak Spanish.

lenders.name: Jules
lenders.loan_because: We are all the same and we must care about and help each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the repair of point of sale equipment from a warehouse in a cave under a mid sized city.

lenders.name: sam
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: I manage IT professionals

lenders.name: Tara
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for what i have in my life. I am delighted that KIVA enables me to loan and participate for just $25.
lenders.occupational_info: Teaching adults about being healthy in the body and mind.

lenders.name: Nausheen
lenders.loan_because: every little bit counts and truly believe in microfinancing. And if i can help someone help him/herself earn a living, feed and school children - - that in itself is completely rewarding!
lenders.occupational_info: human resources function at a large investment bank - i recruit, reward and retain people.

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: i want to help

lenders.name: Partena
lenders.loan_because: I believe that all individuals should be provided with the opportunity to pursue their dreams!

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of helping strong, resourceful, courageous women who are trying to better their own circumstances.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: everybody needs a loan sometime.
lenders.occupational_info: designing the buildings that we live in and around.

lenders.name: June
lenders.loan_because: I believe you need to give back what you receive. I have been fortunate in this life and want to give others who have the desire to succeed the chance to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit agency in Seattle. We serve many people who need a chance to become self sufficient. I believe their situations are temporary and they can move forward in their life with a little help.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I want people worldwide to have a life of dignity and sustainability.  The only way to achieve this in the long-term is to give the people the ability to produce income on their own.  I am happy to help people achieve that goal.  I am the stirrup to help people mount up into the saddle.  Once there, they hold the reins and control their horse.

lenders.name: Melinda
lenders.loan_because: This gives me joy!
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired.  I have been self-employed most of my life.  I support others who want to be self-employed and enourage them to take the weekends off.

lenders.name: Nonhlanhla
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those in need, especially those wanting to start their small businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a learner and own a small catering company, with 3 other partners and staff members.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: The playing field needs to be leveled.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people understand their investments and prepare them for a financially fit future.

lenders.name: Tone
lenders.loan_because: It feels right and good to give people an opportunity to succeed so they can have a better life. And we can all make a difference.

lenders.name: Robert Farrell
lenders.loan_because: I like people who want to help themselves, their families,  and their communities
lenders.occupational_info: engineer
